Privacy Policy

1. Who Are We?

I am Jordan Ismael Damian Jaimes, an independent developer based in Tijuana, Mexico, and the creator of KiddoPlay. KiddoPlay is my personal brand in development. I am responsible for the control of your personal data. You can contact me for any questions regarding this policy at:

  • Phone: +52 663 374 1284
  • Email: kiddoplaystudio@gmail.com

2. What Personal Data Do We Collect?

We do not collect any personal data or information that could personally identify you or your children. KiddoPlay is committed to not gathering names, addresses, personal identifiers, or even anonymous usage statistics from our games. We have also disabled any plugins or third-party integrations that may collect data.

3. Compliance with Regulations and Parental Consent

Since our content is designed for children, we strictly comply with COPPA and GDPR. KiddoPlay does not request or collect personal information from children without parental consent. If we discover that a child has provided personal information without parental consent, we will delete it immediately.

4. Third-Party Services We Use

We work with third-party services to help improve and maintain our offerings. We ensure that these third parties comply with all privacy laws and applicable regulations.

  • Google Analytics (Google Inc.): This service analyzes traffic on our website and helps us improve user experience. Google Analytics does not collect personally identifiable information. The legal basis for processing is legitimate interest (optimization of internal operations).
  • AdMob by Google (Google Inc.): While AdMob allows mobile app developers to monetize apps, KiddoPlay does not use AdMob in our games, meaning no personal data is collected through advertising.

5. Data Security

We take data security very seriously and follow best practices to protect any information that could be at risk. Although we do not collect personal data, we maintain high-security standards in our game's architecture and platforms to ensure a safe experience.

6. Changes to the Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. We will post any changes on our website and notify users of significant updates that may impact the protection of their data. We recommend reviewing this policy regularly to stay informed about how we protect your privacy.

7. Contact Information

If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding our Privacy Policy, feel free to contact us at kiddoplaystudio@gmail.com.
